item.title: Report E-2024030096
item.description:
Report E-2024030096

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-07T15:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-01
  • City: SAINT LOUIS
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO notified ERTS regarding a punctured metal drum containing hazardous product, Onyxide 200. The drum was punctured by a pallet nail and released approximately 1-quart of product onto the wooden trailer floor. A Contractor cleaned-up the release using rags. The damaged drum was overpacked and the rags/ppe were containerized for waste disposal. No storm-drains, waterways, or soil were impacted by the spill.

item.title: Report X-2024030067
item.description:
Report X-2024030067

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-08T18:13:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-28
  • City: EARTH CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE HAZ-MAT WAS FOUND TO BE LEAKING ON THE SORT AISLE SECTION D BELT OF THE EARTH CITY, MO UPS HUB. THE PACKAGE (A 12X12X12 SINGLE WALL FIBERBOARD BOX) WAS SATURATED. THERE WAS ADDITIONAL CONTAMINATED MATERIAL IN THE TRUCK. ALL SPILLED MATERIAL WAS CLEANED, CONTAINED, AND TRANSPORTED TO THE DMP PROCESSING AREA. AN INTERNAL INSPECTION REVEALED PAPER PACKING MATERIAL, A SECOND FIBERBOARD BOX, AND CORRUGATED PARTITIIONS AS PACKING MATERIAL.

item.title: Report X-2024030087
item.description:
Report X-2024030087

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-08T18:13:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-29
  • City: EARTH CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE HAZ-MAT WAS FOUND TO BE LEAKING AT 19:20 ON THE HVD OF THE PD-1 BELT IN THE EARTH CITY, MO UPS HUB. THE SPILLAGE WAS CLEANED, CONTAINED, AND TRANSPORTED TO THE DMP PROCESSING AREA. AN EXTERNAL INSPECTION SHOWED DENTED CORNERS. THE INTERNAL INSPECTION REVEALED NO PACKING MATERIAL TO PROTECT THE INNER RECEPTICLES (1 GALLON PLASTIC BOTTLES) FROM THE SHIPPING PROCESS. ONE BOTTLE HAD A CRACKED CAP. ALL MATERIAL HAS BEEN PROCESSED THROUGH THE UPS DAMAGED MATERIALS PROGRAM.

  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was recovered from the B Wing and placed in a lined tote. DescribePack: One of the four bottles of Dis-Crete developed a crack along its body allowing it to spill its entire contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in the Haz Cage on the Corrosive Pallet.

item.title: Report X-2024021912
item.description:
Report X-2024021912

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-07T15:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-15
  • City: EARTH CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: DAMAGE INSPECTION; LEAKER. SHIPMENT WITHOUT ANY HAZARDOUS MARKINGS OR LABELING WAS DISCOVERED LEAKING IN THE SORT AISLE. DESIGNATED RESPONDER RESPONDED TO LEAKING PACKAGE FOLLOWING THE DECISION TREE, NO LABEL ON BOX OR UNKNOWN RESPONSE SHEET. PRODUCT PH WAS 13 WHICH LED TO CORROSIVE RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONDER FOLLOWED RESPONSE ACTION STEPS TO CLEAN UP THE SPILL.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS SEEN WET ON LOAD SIDES. PACKING PUT IN A HAZ BUCKET W/ BAGS AND TAKEN HAZMAT CAGE. DescribePack: NO HOLE. CAN LEAKING FROM THE SEAL. CAP IS TIGHT DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PUT IN BUCKET W/ HAZ BAG AND FOLD ABSORB
